content:
Since the beginning of a large -scale invasion of the Russian Federation in Ukraine, the Office of the Prosecutor General has documented 16 790 crimes against national security. 127,900 Russia's crimes were also registered.

About thisinformsOffice of the Prosecutor General.

In addition, according to juvenile prosecutors, 1794 children were injured due to aggression of the Russian Federation, 535 of them were killed, 1259 were injured in varying severity.

The department emphasizes that these figures are not final, since work continues to be installed in places of active fighting, in temporarily occupied and liberated territories.

We will remind, in Kharkiv region detained anotherThe associate of the Russianswho followed the Armed Forces fighters.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kiev detainedPseudo -ian, which was fraud with charitable assistance for UAH 1.7 million.
title: Almost 128,000 military crimes have been documented in Ukraine
description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office.    In addition, according to juvenile...
